entities.name: n eville
entities.description: Neville is described as tottering slightly due to Hermione's weight.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one whose weight causes Neville to totter.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as having a recent blow on the back of his head and being unsteady.

entities.name: time room
entities.description: The Time Room is mentioned as swinging shut behind them.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as falling out of the door and being weakly giggling.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as one of the people who fell out of the door.

relationships.description: Harry carries Hermione's weight, causing Neville to totter.
Neville is supported by Harry due to his weight.
Ginny also falls into Harry's arms.
